summary: wes scantlin was arrested in january after he was caught riding a carousel for oversize luggage at the denver airport .   the act and subsequent arrest were caught on surveillance footage - released for the first time this week .   despite having entered restricted space while on the carousel , the singer will not face federal charges .   scantlin made light of his stunt just after his arrest with a photoshopped photo of him sitting on a carousel he posted to facebook .
